caller_intent: Maria from Alliance Insurance is following up with Jeff to present updated insurance quotes for auto and dwelling coverage, highlighting potential premium savings and requesting a follow-up with Amanda to finalize details.
resolution_steps: Maria explains lowering dwelling coverage to $100,000 would reduce the premium by ~$591/year, requiring a new replacement cost estimator.
Discusses auto insurance renewal with Nat General, noting a potential agent-of-record transition and a quoted rate of ~$3,700/year for all vehicles.
Requests Amanda call back to confirm current auto rates and finalize decisions.
summary: Maria from Alliance Insurance presented Jeff with updated auto and dwelling insurance quotes, emphasizing premium savings opportunities. She outlined the need for a replacement cost estimator for the dwelling and discussed auto policy renewal options. The call concluded with a request for Amanda to call back to confirm details and proceed with next steps.
